projects.title: Jaytrain
projects.description: Design and development of a web and mobile application dedicated to sports tracking, allowing users to participate in training sessions, monitor their physical and nutritional progress, and interact through a social platform.

projects.title: ImpÃ©rial
projects.description: Design and development of a highly available, secure, and intuitive online lottery web application, offering an interactive experience for participating in draws.

projects.title: Patient
projects.description: Design and development of an innovative mobile application dedicated to managing both human and animal healthcare. The app enables patients to conveniently order medications online, schedule appointments with healthcare professionals by specialty, and manage their medical follow-ups. It also includes a veterinary module allowing users to book appointments for their pets, providing a complete and centralized experience for the well-being of the whole family.
